From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To configure the maximum number of entries that can exist in the interrupt mask buffer, use the **scheduler interrupt mask size** command in global configuration mode. To reset the maximum number of entries that can exist in the interrupt mask buffer to the default, use the no form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of entries that can exist in the interrupt mask buffer.
